items.sentence: When class is over, it\'ll probably be raining.
Tom wanted to know how Mary had become so rich.
Tom wanted to know where he could buy turmeric.
Tom wants to become a simultaneous interpreter.
Mary doesn\'t want to end up being an old maid.
I suspect that it was Tom who broke the window.
I think being poor is nothing to be ashamed of.
Tom told me he didn\'t know anybody named Mary.
Tom is only interested in selling his own book.
Tom is out of breath and needs to take a break.
